comments.raw_text:
STR: Open two blank tabs.
In first tab, open http://flickrmosaic.com/ and click "Mosaic" at the top.
Click on second tab in tab bar.

At this point, it takes a few seconds for the tab to switch.

When I ran into this problem, it took around ten seconds for the tabs to switch.
comments.creator: mars.martian+bugmail@gmail.com

Possibly a regression?
